title: Canopy Park at Jewel Changi Airport
blurb: Enjoy play attractions and dining options.
description: Located at the topmost level of Jewel Changi Airport, Canopy Park is home to many play attractions and dining options. Attractions include the Discovery Slides, Foggy Bowls, Petal Garden, and Topiary Walk. It offers a mix of horticultural displays and unique leisure experiences for visitors of all ages. Enjoy a fun-filled day with family and friends amidst lush greenery and stunning views. The park also features various dining options to satisfy your cravings after a day of exploration and play. It's a perfect destination for both locals and tourists seeking entertainment and relaxation.
keyword_tag: Canopy Park, Jewel Changi Airport, attractions, play, dining

title: Jewel Rain Vortex at Jewel Changi Airport
blurb: Marvel at the world's tallest indoor waterfall.
description: The Jewel Rain Vortex is the world's tallest indoor waterfall, cascading down seven stories. It is a stunning centerpiece of Jewel Changi Airport, surrounded by lush greenery of the Forest Valley. Visitors can enjoy breathtaking views of the Rain Vortex from various vantage points within Jewel. The HSBC Rain Vortex is a majestic sight to behold, especially during the light and sound show that takes place in the evening. It's a must-see attraction for anyone visiting Singapore, offering a unique and unforgettable experience. The surrounding Forest Valley provides a tranquil escape amidst the bustling airport environment.
datetime_display: Open daily, check website for showtimes
keyword_tag: Rain Vortex, Jewel Changi Airport, waterfall, attraction

title: Forest Valley at Jewel Changi Airport
blurb: Explore lush greenery in an indoor environment.
description: The Forest Valley at Jewel Changi Airport is an indoor garden featuring thousands of trees and plants. Visitors can wander through the lush landscape, enjoying the tranquility and beauty of nature. The Forest Valley provides a refreshing escape from the urban environment, offering a serene space for relaxation and exploration. It's a perfect place to take a leisurely stroll, admire the diverse flora, and connect with nature. The valley surrounds the Rain Vortex, creating a harmonious blend of water and greenery. It's an ideal destination for nature lovers and those seeking a peaceful retreat.
keyword_tag: Forest Valley, Jewel Changi Airport, garden, nature

The hotel provides a refreshing environment for travelers looking to rest and recharge before or after their flights. With modern amenities and a focus on efficiency, YOTELAIR ensures a seamless and enjoyable stay for all guests. It is family-friendly and provides a comfortable environment for all.

title: Jewel Celebrates The Magic of Adventure
blurb: Adventure awaits with Disney Cruise Line this season!
description: Jewel Changi Airport celebrates the Magic of Adventure with Disney Cruise Line, featuring a 16-metre tall Disney Adventure Festive Tree at Forest Valley, adorned with lights and Mickey-shaped ornaments. Four-metre tall topiary sculptures of Captain Mickey Mouse and Captain Minnie Mouse and a Disney Cruise Line inspired anchor are also present. Photo installations at Canopy Park, inspired by the themed areas onboard the ship, feature characters from Toy Story and the Disney Princesses. A special installation inspired by Duffy and the Friend Ship will be performed at the Disney Imagination Garden onboard the ship. Enjoy the Magic of Adventure Light & Music Showcase, a journey through the seven themed areas onboard the Disney Adventure, with Disney, Pixar and Marvel stories appearing on the Rain Vortex.
keyword_tag: Disney, Light & Music Showcase, Photo Installations, Festive Tree

title: Jewel Changi Airport's Disney Adventure
blurb: Win a magical cruise voyage on the Disney Adventure!
description: Stand a chance to win a 3-night cruise voyage in a Deluxe Garden View with Verandah Stateroom on the Disney Adventure! Post your most creative photo or video of the Disney Cruise Line themed installation at Canopy Park AND Forest Valley. Tell us why you'd love to sail away on the magical Disney Adventure. Pre-purchase your Canopy Park tickets before 5 Nov on our website today! Tag @jewelchangiairport & #DisneyCruiseAdventureJEWEL2025.
keyword_tag: Disney Cruise, Canopy Park, Forest Valley, Photo Contest

title: The Magic of Adventure Light & Music Showcase
blurb: Dazzling light & sound show at Jewel Rain Vortex!
description: Experience the all-new Light & Music Showcase, The Magic of Adventure, transforming the iconic 40-metre-tall Jewel Rain Vortex into a dazzling stage. Guests will be taken on a journey through the seven themed areas onboard the Disney Adventure, each represented by its respective glowing medallions. Enjoy a spectacular blend of light and sound, and look out for beloved Disney, Pixar and Marvel stories that will appear on the Rain Vortex. This family-friendly showcase is perfect for all ages. Spend and redeem limited-edition Disney Cruise Line collectibles with a minimum spend of $60.
datetime_display: Mon to Sun (including eve of PH and PH): 8pm and 9pm
keyword_tag: Light and Music Show, Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Family, Collectibles

title: Disney Cruise Line Collectibles at Jewel Changi
blurb: Purchase limited-edition Disney collectibles with spend.
description: Purchase a limited-edition Disney Cruise Line collectible at $15.90, $29.90 or $52.90 when you spend a minimum of $60 in a single receipt. Available collectibles include a Mini Luggage, Travel Blanket with Bag, Sailor Chip Cushion, Sailor Dale Cushion, and a Puffy Carry-on Bag with Surprise bag charm. Purchase the collectibles via the Changi app and bring along your qualifying receipt and collectible purchase confirmation email to L2 East Gateway Garden for collection from 11am - 10pm daily. Last redemption is at 9:30pm. Collectibles can be purchased via the Changi app.
keyword_tag: Disney collectibles, shopping, Jewel Changi Airport

title: Jewel Changi Airport Celebrates Disney Adventure
blurb: Win a Disney Cruise Line stay with UOB card spend!
description: Spend a minimum of $200 in a single receipt with your UOB Credit/Debit card at any participating outlets in Jewel Changi Airport and stand a chance to win a 3-night stay in a Deluxe Oceanview Stateroom with Verandah onboard the Disney Adventure (worth USD $2,500). Redemptions must be made at Level 2 East Gateway Garden (between Coucou Hotpot.Brew Tea and Kams Roast) from 11am to 10pm daily. Last redemption is at 9:30pm. This promotion offers an exciting opportunity for families to experience the magic of Disney Cruise Line.
datetime_display: 11am to 10pm, daily. Last redemption is at 9:30pm.
keyword_tag: Disney Cruise, UOB card promotion, Jewel Changi Airport

title: Jewel Changi Airport Retail & F&B Outlets
blurb: Redeem a Jewel Gift Voucher with Mastercard purchase.
description: Enjoy shopping and dining at Jewel Changi Airport's various retail and F&B outlets. Spend a minimum of $200 in a maximum of 3 same-day receipts charged to your Mastercard to redeem a $10 Jewel Gift Voucher. Redemptions can be made daily from 11am to 10pm at Level 2 East Gateway Garden (between Coucou Hotpot.Brew Tea and Kams Roast). Last redemption is at 9:30pm. Terms and conditions apply. Explore a wide range of retail options and dining experiences suitable for families and individuals alike. This promotion enhances the shopping experience, making it more rewarding for Mastercard users.
keyword_tag: shopping, dining, retail, F&B, Jewel Changi Airport, Mastercard promotion
